summary: I WAS IN MY CAR, PARKED IN MY DRIVEWAY, WHEN THE ENTIRE FRONT OF MY CAR BURST INTO FLAMES.  THE OCCUPANT COMPARTMENT WAS QUICKLY INVOLVED IN FIRE.  I EXITED MY CAR AND ATTEMPTED TO PUT THE FIRE OUT WITH A GARDEN HOSE.  THE FLAMES SHOT  UNDERNEATH MY CAR AND UP THE BACK END.  I CALLED 911.  I RECEIVED BURNS ON THE TOP OF MY HEAD AND SMOKE INHALATION DAMAGES TO MY LUNGS. *JB
